A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie itself was consistent with it's predecessors in the trilogy\, but failed to add anything to the franchise. It took a great hero\, like Luke Skywalker\, and tried to turn him into a bitter old man. Other than the Ray/Luke tangent; the film it's self tried to fit too much in\, leaving out a lot of character development. Overall\, I think the credibility of this film is level with the original trilogy in the early 2000s.
